mapper.select: SELECT group_concat(DISTINCT(orders_no)) FROM orders WHERE payment_no = #{paymentNo};

SELECT o.payment_no AS paymentNo , o.orders_no AS ordersNo , gc.goods_no AS goodsNo , ct.category_no AS categoryNo , o.orders_amount AS ordersAmount , g.goods_title AS goodsTitle , g.goods_memo AS goodsMemo , g.goods_price AS goodsPrice , g.goods_status AS goodsStatus , ct.category_title AS categoryTitle , IFNULL(temp2.goodsFileName, 'no file') AS goodsFileName , temp2.goodsFileExt AS goodsFileExt , temp2.goodsFileNo AS goodsFileNo FROM category ct INNER JOIN goods_category gc ON gc.category_no = ct.category_no INNER JOIN goods g ON gc.goods_no = g.goods_no INNER JOIN orders o ON o.goods_no = g.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT g.goods_no AS goodsNo , g.goods_title AS goodsTitle , temp1.goodsFileNo AS goodsFileNo , temp1.goodsFileName AS goodsFileName , temp1.goodsFileOriginName AS goodsFileOriginName , temp1.goodsFileType AS goodsFileType , temp1.goodsFileSize AS goodsFileSize , temp1.createDate AS createDate , temp1.updateDate AS updateDate , temp1.goodsFileExt AS goodsFileExt FROM goods g INNER JOIN (SELECT goods_file.goods_file_no AS goodsFileNo , goods_file.goods_no AS goodsNo , goods_file.goods_file_name AS goodsFileName , goods_file.goods_file_origin_name AS goodsFileOriginName , goods_file.goods_file_type AS goodsFileType , goods_file.goods_file_size AS goodsFileSize , goods_file.create_date AS createDate , goods_file.update_date AS updateDate , goods_file.goods_file_ext AS goodsFileExt FROM goods_file INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(goods_file_no) AS goods_file_no FROM goods_file GROUP BY goods_no) temp0 ON temp0.goods_file_no = goods_file.goods_file_no) temp1 ON temp1.goodsNo = g.goods_no) temp2 ON gc.goods_no = temp2.goodsNo where o.orders_no = #{ordersNo}
